sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Box, Select, SimpleGrid, Input, Button } from '@chakra-ui/core';

const Filter = props => {
  const {
    name,
    setName,
    status,
    setStatus,
    species,
    setSpecies,
    type,
    setType,
    gender,
    setGender,
    onClick
  } = props;

  return (
    <Box border="0px solid gray" borderRadius={5} mt="20px" mb="20px">
      <SimpleGrid columns={{ md: 6, xs: 1 }} spacing="15px">
        <Input placeholder="Name" value={name} onChange={e => setName(e.target.value)} />
        <Select placeholder="Status" value={status} onChange={e => setStatus(e.target.value)}>
          <option value="option2">Alive</option>
          <option value="option1">Dead</option>
          <option value="option3">unknown</option>
        </Select>
        <Input placeholder="Species" value={species} onChange={e => setSpecies(e.target.value)} />

        <Input placeholder="Type" value={type} onChange={e => setType(e.target.value)} />

        <Select placeholder="Gender" value={gender} onChange={e => setGender(e.target.value)}>
          <option value="option1">Male</option>
          <option value="option2">Female</option>
          <option value="option3">Genderless</option>
          <option value="option3">unknown</option>
        </Select>
        <Button variantColor="blue" onClick={onClick}>
          Filter
        </Button>
      </SimpleGrid>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default Filter;
